import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Navbar from '../components/navbar' import Explore from '../pages/Explore' const Home = () => { useEffect(() => { const letters = document.querySelectorAll('.wave-letter'); gsap.fromTo( letters, { y: 0 }, { y: -20, repeat: -1, yoyo: true, stagger: 0.1, ease: 'power1.inOut', duration: 1.5, } ); }, []); return ( <>

{['R', 'e', 'p', 'r', 'e', 's', 'e', 'n', 't'].map((char, idx) => ( {char} ))}

{['Y', 'o', 'u', 'r', 's', 'e', 'l', 'f'].map((char, idx) => ( {char} ))}

Party Wear
Tops & T-Shirts
Blouses & Shirts
Dresses
Skirts
Jeans & Pants
Leggings & Jeggings
Ethnic Wear
Sweaters & Cardigans
Office Wear
Vacation Outfits
) } export default Home
